# Code of Conduct

We are committed to a friendly, safe, and welcoming environment for all.

## Our Pledge

We pledge to make participation in our project harassment-free for everyone.

## Our Standards

- Be respectful and constructive
- Accept constructive criticism gracefully
- Focus on what is best for the community

## Enforcement

Report unacceptable behavior to the maintainers via issues or email. The
maintainers will review and take appropriate action.

This document is adapted from the Contributor Covenant.
